scenarios.description:
5aaa MPP mpp5a
5aaa MPP works anywhere as long as you are fairly
close to your opponent. Try to do these setups closer
to the corner so they have less room to escape
scenarios.name: Basic midscreen setups

scenarios.description:
5aa 5b MPP mpp8/9 mppj5c
High damage corner only at point blank
scenarios.name: Corner 5aa setup

scenarios.description:
CH MPP mpp9 mppj5a
Normally it is difficult to catch the opponent
if you counterhit the them using MPP as a reversal
If they are near the corner however, you can do this
scenarios.name: Near corner CH confirm

scenarios.description:
CH mpp5a/mppj5b mpp5a/mpp5c
On CH mpp5a and mppj5b can be followed up on for
massive damage
scenarios.name: Punish mashing opponents/DS confirm

scenarios.description:
mpp5a mpp5c and mppj5a are all AUB
make sure to punish jumpy opponents
scenarios.name: Its all AUB

scenarios.description:
mpp5 mpp5(optional) mpp5a/mpp5c MPP's idle animation can hit opponents the horn
which is unblockabe. Make sure to follow up.
if going for two horn hits, delay the second one
slightly to follow up with mpp5a
scenarios.name: The horn

scenarios.description:
Normally mppj5a whiffs against crouching opponents.
However, against Iku, Yukari, and Utsuho it will connect
mppj5a can be used as an overhead mixup against them
scenarios.name: Tall people beware
